title: Just Married
content:
Would someone be so kind to share what this font is. I must say I am always amazed on how quickly people can recognize fonts. Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [weddingsigns.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052234/http:/typophile.com/files/weddingsigns.jpg) | 5.86 KB |
author: joceybella

comments.content:
Based on the fact that the two râ€™s are different, and the way the letters are fit, I would say this is hand-drawn and not a font.

- Mike Yanega
But you could look at a foundry like [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052234/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home) to see if you can find something similar.
